title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python applications.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama, supporting Node.js and browser environments.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local Ollama models within LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat interface for Ollama with model management, multi-user support, and OpenAI-style API compatibility.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java library for integrating Ollama models into JVM applications with fluent API design.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository for building RAG pipelines using Ollama embeddings and local vector stores.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators and embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package distributing the JavaScript client for Ollama with zero native dependencies.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package for the Python client, supporting Python 3.8+ and async/await patterns.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# client for Ollama with .NET 6+ support and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio async runtime.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama containers and runs model benchmarks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models into channels with threaded replies and rate limiting.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama API with GenServer behavior for fault-tolerant LLM services.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Branch of GPT4All UI that adds Ollama backend support, letting users switch between local backends.
